system.sustained:
Psyker can Stun and injure target within range. On Successful Focus Power Test, deal 1d10 + Psy Rating Impact Damage, with Shocking Quality that ignores armour. Target Suffers -5*Psy Rating Toughness Test to resist being Stunned for one round + 1 per DoF.
Shocking: If Target takes any damage from attack, makes +0 Toughness Test, on failiure Target is stunned for a number of rounds equal to half the damage suffered. +10 to save per AP.
